languages.text: {n}Клешня демонетки смыкается на горле Маражая и валит его на колени. Друкари пытается сопротивляться, однако его клинок разрезает лишь пустоту. С голодным воем демонетка склоняется над эльдаром и впивается губами в его рот. Мгновение — и тело Маражая, словно изломанная марионетка, оседает на пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Клешня демонетки смыкается на горле Маражая и валит его на колени. Друкари пытается сопротивляться, однако его клинок разрезает лишь пустоту. С голодным воем демонетка склоняется над эльдаром и впивается губами в его рот. Мгновение — и тело Маражая, словно изломанная марионетка, оседает на пол.{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Клешня демонетки смыкается на горле Маражая и валит его на колени. Друкари пытается сопротивляться, однако его клинок разрезает лишь пустоту. С голодным воем демонетка склоняется над эльдаром и впивается губами в его рот. Мгновение — и тело Маражая, словно изломанная марионетка, оседает на пол.{/n}

The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pince de la démonette saisit Marazhai à la gorge et le force à se mettre à genoux. Il tente vainement de résister, mais sa lame ne fait que fendre l'air. Son assaillante lance un grognement affamé, se penche sur lui et colle ses lèvres aux siennes. Une seconde plus tard, le corps de Marazhai s'effondre comme un pantin désarticulé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pince de la démonette saisit Marazhai à la gorge et le force à se mettre à genoux. Il tente vainement de résister, mais sa lame ne fait que fendre l'air. Son assaillante lance un grognement affamé, se penche sur lui et colle ses lèvres aux siennes. Une seconde plus tard, le corps de Marazhai s'effondre comme un pantin désarticulé.{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}デモネットの鋏がマラズハイの喉を締め付け、膝をつかせる。彼は抵抗しようとするが、刃は空気を切り裂くだけだ。デモネットは飢えた遠吠えを上げ、マラズハイの上へと身を乗り出し、その口に唇を押し当てる。次の瞬間、彼の体は壊れた人形のように崩れ落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デモネットの鋏がマラズハイの喉を締め付け、膝をつかせる。彼は抵抗しようとするが、刃は空気を切り裂くだけだ。デモネットは飢えた遠吠えを上げ、マラズハイの上へと身を乗り出し、その口に唇を押し当てる。次の瞬間、彼の体は壊れた人形のように崩れ落ちた。{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}欲魔的巨钳钳住了玛拉斋的喉咙，逼得玛拉斋跪在地上。玛拉斋试图反抗，但他的刀刃却只划过了空气。欲魔发出一声饥渴的嚎叫，俯身压在玛拉斋身上，双唇紧紧地堵住了玛拉斋的嘴巴。没过多久，玛拉斋的身体瘫倒在地，仿佛被弄坏的木偶一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}欲魔的巨钳钳住了玛拉斋的喉咙，逼得玛拉斋跪在地上。玛拉斋试图反抗，但他的刀刃却只划过了空气。欲魔发出一声饥渴的嚎叫，俯身压在玛拉斋身上，双唇紧紧地堵住了玛拉斋的嘴巴。没过多久，玛拉斋的身体瘫倒在地，仿佛被弄坏的木偶一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}Der Greifer der Dämonette schlingt sich um Marazhais Kehle und zwingt ihn in die Knie. Er versucht, sich zu wehren, doch seine Klinge trifft nur Luft. Die Dämonette stößt ein hungriges Heulen aus, beugt sich über Marazhai und drückt ihre Lippen gegen seinen Mund. Einen Augenblick später bricht sein Körper zusammen wie eine kaputte Marionette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Greifer der Dämonette schlingt sich um Marazhais Kehle und zwingt ihn in die Knie. Er versucht, sich zu wehren, doch seine Klinge trifft nur Luft. Die Dämonette stößt ein hungriges Heulen aus, beugt sich über Marazhai und drückt ihre Lippen gegen seinen Mund. Einen Augenblick später bricht sein Körper zusammen wie eine kaputte Marionette.{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}La pinza de la diablilla se cierra en torno a la garganta de Marazhai y le obliga a postrarse de rodillas. El Drukhari trata de resistirse, pero su espada no corta más que el aire. La diablilla profiere un aullido voraz, se inclina sobre Marazhai y presiona sus labios contra su boca. Un instante después, el cuerpo del Drukhari se desploma como una marioneta desmadejada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pinza de la diablilla se cierra en torno a la garganta de Marazhai y le obliga a postrarse de rodillas. El Drukhari trata de resistirse, pero su espada no corta más que el aire. La diablilla profiere un aullido voraz, se inclina sobre Marazhai y presiona sus labios contra su boca. Un instante después, el cuerpo del Drukhari se desploma como una marioneta desmadejada.{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: {n}İblisiçe'nin kıskacı, Marazhai'ın boğazına kenetlenip onu diz çökmeye zorluyor. Marazhai direnmeye çalışsa da kılıcı, havadan başka bir şeyi kesemiyor. İblisiçe; aç bir şekilde uluyor, Marazhai'a eğiliyor ve dudaklarını ağzına bastırıyor. Kısa bir süre sonra Marazhai'ın cesedi, kırık bir kukla gibi yere devriliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Daemonette's pincer clamps around Marazhai's throat and forces him onto his knees. He tries to resist, but his blade slashes nothing but air. The Daemonette lets out a hungry howl, leans over Marazhai, and presses her lips against his mouth. A moment later, his body crumples like a broken puppet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İblisiçe'nin kıskacı Marazhai'ın boğazına kenetleniyor ve onu diz çökmeye zorluyor. Marazhai direnmeye çalışıyor ancak kılıcı havadan başka bir şeyi kesemiyor. İblisiçe aç bir şekilde uluyor, Marazhai'a eğiliyor ve dudaklarını ağzına bastırıyor. Marazhai'ın cesedinin kırık bir kukla gibi yere devrilmesi fazla uzun sürmüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1
